name: school-chat-system
description: School Chat System with LIFF and Node.js

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.postinstall: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && npm run lint || echo 'Backend lint not configured'
scripts.deploy:prepare: npm run install:all && npm run build
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm run install:all && npm run build:frontend

author: School Chat System Team
